price: Indeed, there are signs in this, and We always put people to the test.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
